import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; // Import the image utility from the TourCard component const getTourImage = (id) => { const images = [ 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1516483638261-f4dbaf036963?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1886&q=80', // Venice 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1587139223877-04cb899fa3e8?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1974&q=80', // Australia 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1520769490320-493e53d9a43f?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1856&q=80', // Norway 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1613395877344-13d4a8e0d49e?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1935&q=80', // Greece 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1528181304800-259b08848526?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1920&q=80', // Thailand ]; // Use modulo to ensure we don't go out of bounds const index = (id - 1) % images.length; return images[index]; }; // Get additional images for the gallery section const getAdditionalImages = (id) => { const baseIndex = ((id - 1) % 10) * 3; const allImages = [ // Paris extras 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1502602898657-3e91760cbb34?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1973&q=80', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1520939817895-060bdaf4fe1b?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1923&q=80', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1548247365-2a3e7c814b90?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1968&q=80', // Tokyo extras 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1552978534-9f49c9513916?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1974&q=80', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1557409518-691ebcd96038?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1950&q=80', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1504198322253-cfa87a0ff60f?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1756&q=80', // New York extras 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1496442226666-8d4d0e62e6e9?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1920&q=80', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1515698986721-f3721d2284be?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1887&q=80', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1569854165519-fc686efe0b05?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1996&q=80', // And so on for other locations... 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1583395123894-4968afd2eab9?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1935&q=80', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1544441892-794166f1e3be?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1950&q=80', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1568274356871-b3f42bf1f8ef?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1935&q=80', // Add more images for the remaining destinations 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1519112232436-e2a5030f5a72?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1936&q=80', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1533673595982-854edde5126b?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1932&q=80', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1522083165195-3424ed129620?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1960&q=80', ]; // Return 3 images for the gallery return [ allImages[baseIndex % allImages.length], allImages[(baseIndex + 1) % allImages.length], allImages[(baseIndex + 2) % allImages.length] ]; }; const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const [tour, setTour] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(null); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); useEffect(() => { const fetchTourDetails = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get(`/api/tours/${id}`); setTour(response.data.data.tour); setLoading(false); } catch (err) { setError('Failed to fetch tour details. Please try again later.'); setLoading(false); console.error('Error fetching tour details:', err); } }; fetchTourDetails(); // Scroll to top when component mounts window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, [id]); const handleTabChange = (tab) => { setActiveTab(tab); }; if (loading) { return (
Loading...

Loading tour details...

); } if (error) { return (
{error}
); } if (!tour) { return (
Tour not found.
Back to Tours
); } const galleryImages = getAdditionalImages(parseInt(id)); return (

{tour.title}

{tour.location}
{activeTab === 'overview' && (

Tour Details

Duration

{tour.duration} days

Price

${tour.price}

Group Size

Max 12 people

Rating

4.8/5.0

Description

Experience the beauty and culture of {tour.location} on this {tour.duration}-day adventure!

This tour offers a perfect blend of sightseeing, relaxation, and cultural immersion. From historical landmarks to natural wonders, this tour covers all the must-see attractions in {tour.location}.

Join us on this unforgettable journey and create memories that will last a lifetime. Our experienced guides will take you off the beaten path to discover hidden gems and local favorites that most tourists never see.

Highlights

  • All-inclusive package with quality accommodations
  • Professional tour guide throughout the trip
  • Visit to iconic landmarks and attractions
  • Comfortable transportation between destinations
  • Daily breakfast and select meals included
  • Immersive cultural experiences with locals
)} {activeTab === 'itinerary' && (

Tour Itinerary

1

Day 1: Arrival and Welcome

Full Day

Arrive at your destination and check into your hotel. Meet your tour guide and fellow travelers during a welcome dinner at a local restaurant. Get briefed about the exciting journey ahead.

2

Day 2: City Exploration

Full Day

Visit the main attractions of the city with a knowledgeable local guide. Enjoy lunch at a famous local establishment and continue exploring in the afternoon. Evening at leisure to explore on your own.

3

Day 3: Cultural Immersion

Full Day

Immerse yourself in the local culture with activities like cooking classes, craft workshops, or traditional performances. Visit local markets and interact with artisans to learn about traditional crafts.

{tour.duration > 3 && (
4+

Day 4 and Beyond

Multiple Days

Continue exploring the region's highlights, including natural wonders, historical sites, and hidden gems. Detailed itinerary will be provided upon booking, tailored to the season and local events.

)}
)} {activeTab === 'gallery' && (

Photo Gallery

{galleryImages.map((img, index) => (
e.currentTarget.style.transform = 'scale(1.03)'} onMouseOut={(e) => e.currentTarget.style.transform = 'scale(1)'} />
))}
)}

From
${tour.price} / person

Group Discount: Save 10% for 4+ people
Rating: (48 reviews)
Book Now
Duration: {tour.duration} days
Group Size: 2-12 people
Available: Year-round
Languages: English, Spanish

Free cancellation up to 24 hours before the tour

Reserve now & pay later to book your spot without payment

); }; export default TourDetails;
